msContents.summary: An agreement concerning an emphyteutic (perpetual) lease of land between Patrikios (lessee) and Gessios (lessor).

msItemStruct.note: The text is located in the inside of the roll (recto). Written transversa charta, running from the roll’s core to the uppermost layers. Only the left side has been preserved (margin 2–2.5 cm). Written in a large, clear, professional upright cursive.
